data.meanings: Proposition which points to cause, space or time. In, into, amongst, in company with, during, with, of, for, for the sake of, upon, concerning, after, in comparison, about, among, on account of, respecting, by the side of, on, by, against, according to, in respect of.
data.sentence: The word فِي comes from the root ف ي and is associated with the meanings: Proposition which points to cause, space or time. In, into, amongst, in company with, during, with, of, for, for the sake of, upon, concerning, after, in comparison, about, among, on account of, respecting, by the side of, on, by, against, according to, in respect of.
The word أَوْ comes from the root ا و and is associated with the meanings: or

data.meanings: day, era, time, today, this/that day, age/period of time.
data.sentence: The word يَوْمٍ comes from the root ي و م and is associated with the meanings: day, era, time, today, this/that day, age/period of time.
The word ذِي comes from the root ذ و and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: ate/taste/swallowed, to flavour/savour, appetite/desire, to feed/supply, way of eating, food/meal, cultivate, ripened fruit, an approvable quality in a man (e.g. intelligence/prudence/discretion), good state/condition in respect of food, one who feeds much, place of eating.
data.sentence: The word إِطْعَامٌ comes from the root ط ع م and is associated with the meanings: ate/taste/swallowed, to flavour/savour, appetite/desire, to feed/supply, way of eating, food/meal, cultivate, ripened fruit, an approvable quality in a man (e.g. intelligence/prudence/discretion), good state/condition in respect of food, one who feeds much, place of eating.

data.meanings: to be hungry, suffer from hunger and want. masghabah - starvation/hunger/famine, privation to hunger.
data.sentence: The word مَسْغَبَةٍ comes from the root س غ ب and is associated with the meanings: to be hungry, suffer from hunger and want. masghabah - starvation/hunger/famine, privation to hunger.
